snippet: The Pop Art show at Acquavella includes work by Roy Lichtenstein, Stephen Antonakos, Robert Arneson and H. C. Westermann.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews There Must be a Heaven exhibition featuring paintings of Benny Andrews at Michael Rosenfeld Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The Pop Art show at Acquavella includes work by Roy Lichtenstein, Stephen Antonakos, Robert Arneson and H. C. Westermann.

headline.print_headline: The Pop Object: 'The Still Life Tradition in Pop Art'
headline.main: ‘The Still Life Tradition in Pop Art’
